data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Antananarivo do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Antananarivo, Madagascar
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Antananarivo, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 16 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Antananarivo to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Antananarivo, Madagascar that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Gujarati people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Gujarati people know you.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Antananarivo, Madagascar to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Antananarivo, Madagascar by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Antananarivo, Madagascar has a population of 2,811,500.

We estimate Antananarivo has 171,420 people who might know Jesus, 1,224,701 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,415,380 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 171,420 believers in Antananarivo that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
